# PRD-014: UI/UX Pro Max Redesign
> **Status**: Draft
> **Goal**: Comprehensive visual overhaul to "High-End SaaS" standard (Linear/Vercel style).

## 1. Design Philosophy
- **Aesthetic**: "Refined Functionalism". Minimalist, information-dense but breathable, polished interactive states.
- **Keywords**: Precision, Professional, AI-Native, Clean.

## 2. Design System (Generated by ui-ux-pro-max)

### ðŸŽ¨ Color Palette
- **Primary**: Indigo-600 (`#4F46E5`) -> Hover: Indigo-700.
- **Background**:
  - Page: `bg-slate-50` (Light Mode) / `bg-[#0B1120]` (Dark Mode - Future Proofing).
  - Surface: `bg-white` with subtle warmth (`rgb(255 255 255)`).
- **Text**:
  - Headings: `text-slate-900` (almost black).
  - Body: `text-slate-600` (high readability).
  - Muted: `text-slate-400`.
- **Borders**: `border-slate-200` (Subtle, crisp).

### ðŸªœ Typography
- **Sans**: `Inter` (Standard for SaaS).
- **Mono**: `JetBrains Mono` (For logs, code, K8s resources).
- **Scale**:
  - H1: `text-2xl font-semibold tracking-tight`.
  - H2: `text-lg font-medium tracking-tight`.
  - Body: `text-sm leading-relaxed` (Dense UI friendly).

### ðŸ§± Layout Structure
1.  **Sidebar (Navigation)**:
    - Width: Fixed (e.g., `w-64`).
    - Style: Clean, no visible border (use distinct bg color `bg-slate-50/50` or subtle separator).
    - Interaction: Ghost buttons with `bg-slate-200/50` hover.
2.  **Main Content (Chat/Dashboard)**:
    - Style: "White Paper" look.
    - Max Width: Centered `max-w-5xl` for readability.
3.  **Chat Interface**:
    - **Messages**:
        - User: Minimalist "Pill" or Gradient-subtle background.
        - Agent: Clean text with semantic formatting (Tables, Code blocks highlighted).
    - **Input Area**:
        - Style: "Floating Command Center".
        - Location: Bottom center, floating with `backdrop-blur`.
        - Features: Integrated tool icons, clean shadow.

### ðŸŒŸ Interactive Elements
- **Buttons**:
    - Primary: `bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800` (Linear style).
    - Secondary: `bg-white border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50`.
- **Shadows**:
    - `shadow-sm`: Cards.
    - `shadow-xl ring-1 ring-black/5`: Floating elements (Modals, Input).


## 3. Implementation Plan
- [x] **Tailwind Config**: Update colors to `slate` scale (removing cool-gray if present), add new shadow/typography utilities.
- [x] **Layout Refactor**:
    - [x] Redesign `Sidebar` (Minimalist, "Ghost" aesthetic).
    - [x] Redesign `Header` (Transparent/Blur, Context-aware).
- [x] **Chat Experience**:
    - [x] Refine `ChatInput` (Make it a true "Command Bar").
    - [x] Refine `ChatMessage` (Pro typography, better code block rendering).
- [x] **Polish**:
    - [x] Add `Framer Motion` for smooth entry animations (already installed).
    - [x] Ensure "Pixel Perfect" alignment.
    - [x] Qwen Alignment (Sidebar, Padding, Width).
    - [x] Remove Session Header.
